title: In Mean Girls, why doesn't Northshore High have cameras in the hallway? If they did, the principal could find out who threw the papers that caused the fighting. - Quora

response.answer_text: It makes the plot more smoothly that they don’t have cameras. If the hallway did have cameras, Regina would be a bit of an idiot not to take that into account in the first place. Make no mistake, Regina didn’t want to get caught, and cameras in the way meant that she would have thought of a different way to disseminate the papers; but the plot demanded one in which a locker room hallway fight ensued. Entertainment over reason, so such a cult classic might exist.
